content:
I notice several key issues from the execution:

1. There are many existing entities around the furnace, including multiple inserters and belt groups
2. We hit a distance limitation when trying to place belts (max distance is 10 units)
3. The drill is quite far away at x=-19.5, y=18.703125

Let's try a different approach with shorter segments and more movement:

```python
# First get resources and craft
move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.IronOre), quantity=100)

move_to(nearest(Resource.Coal))
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Coal), quantity=50)

# Smelt iron plates
print("Smelting iron plates...")
move_to(furnace1.position)
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=50)
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, quantity=10)
sleep(15)
extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, furnace1.position, quantity=50)

# Craft components
print("Crafting components...")
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel, quantity=5)
craft_item(Prototype.TransportBelt, quantity=40)
craft_item(Prototype.BurnerInserter, quantity=2)

# Get positions
drill_pos = drill.drop_position
furnace_pos = furnace1.position
print(f"Planning path from furnace at {furnace_pos} to drill at {drill_pos}")

def build_belt_segment(start_pos, end_pos, max_segment_length=8):
    """Build a belt segment between two points, moving as needed"""
    current_pos = start_pos
    target_pos = end_pos
    
    while abs(current_pos.x - target_pos.x) > 1 or abs(current_pos.y - target_pos.y) > 1:
        # Move to current position
        move_to(current_pos)
        
        # Calculate next position
        dx = target_pos.x - current_pos.x
        dy = target_pos.y - current_pos.y
        
        # Determine primary direction
        if abs(dx) > abs(dy):
            # Move horizontally
            step_x = max_segment_length if dx > 0 else -max_segment_length
            next_x = current_pos.x + (step_x if abs(dx) > abs(step_x) else dx)
            next_pos = Position(x=next_x, y=current_pos.y)
            direction = Direction.RIGHT if dx > 0 else Direction.LEFT
        else:
            # Move vertically
            step_y = max_segment_length if dy > 0 else -max_segment_length
            next_y = current_pos.y + (step_y if abs(dy) > abs(step_y) else dy)
            next_pos = Position(x=current_pos.x, y=next_y)
            direction = Direction.UP if dy > 0 else Direction.DOWN
        
        # Place belt
        belt = place_entity(
            Prototype.TransportBelt,
            position=next_pos,
            direction=direction
        )
        assert belt, f"Failed to place belt at {next_pos}"
        print(f"Placed belt at {next_pos}")
        
        current_pos = next_pos

# Start at furnace
print("Starting construction...")
move_to(furnace_pos)

# Place inserter at furnace (try different position)
inserter_pos = Position(x=furnace_pos.x - 1.0, y=furnace_pos.y + 1.0)
print(f"Placing inserter at {inserter_pos}")
furnace_inserter = place_entity(
    Prototype.BurnerInserter,
    position=inserter_pos,
    direction=Direction.RIGHT
)
assert furnace_inserter, "Failed to place furnace inserter"

# Build belt line in segments
start_pos = Position(x=inserter_pos.x - 1.0, y=inserter_pos.y)
print(f"Building belt line from {
